resources.string: Cats communicate through a variety of vocalizations, such as meowing, purring, trilling, hissing, growling, and grunting.

Cats have a specialized collarbone (or clavicle) that allows them to always land on their feet when they fall. This ability, known as the "righting reflex," is observable in cats as young as three weeks old and is fully developed at 7 weeks.
